title: What The Board Needs To Know
description: Everything from the week beginning May 8th, 2023 that a corporate board director needs to know ahead of a board meeting. This week, we highlight how concealing a data breach at Uber led to 15 months’ probation for the company’s former CISO and what directors need to consider. We also cover why the lack of communication between boards and CISOs, cyber attacks from Iran, how AI can fill the talent gap and the call for standardization in cyber regulations.
